comments_since_last_sample.body: I would like if you could compare the Nintendo Switch version against the PS4 and Xbox.
Games just feel better at 60fps. The only time I’d be willing to drop down to 30fps would be for RT. I sit 8 feet away from my TV. 1080p looks fine from that distance.
Games like this are reason why we are buying hardware not stupid fps, this is minimal level of quality in quality mode on Xbox series X we expect from next gen
He already answered the qustion at 1:06 by saying : " So wihch is the best way to play {PC EXCLUDED} "
Reason I didn’t buy the game was 4K was locked 30 FPS for next gen consoles.
